intro: Melissa maritima, commonly known as coastal lemon balm, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is a low-growing perennial herb with aromatic leaves that emit a lemony scent. The plant features small, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters during the summer months. Its leaves are often used in herbal teas and traditional medicine for their calming properties. Melissa maritima thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in coastal and rocky habitats.
